alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Catawba; Cleveland; Gaston; Lincoln (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 12 at 5:29PM EDT until August 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS EXTENDED SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 635 TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING AREAS UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA ELBERT IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA ALEXANDER CATAWBA CLEVELAND GASTON LINCOLN IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA ABBEVILLE CHEROKEE CHESTER GREENWOOD LAURENS UNION SC YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, BETHLEHEM, BLACKSTOCK, CALHOUN FALLS, CATAWBA, CHESTER, CLINTON, CORNWELL, CROUSE, ELBERTON, ELLENDALE, FORTSONIA, GAFFNEY, GASTONIA, GREAT FALLS, HICKORY, HIDDENITE, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LAURENS, LINCOLNTON, MIDDLETON, MILLERSVILLE, MONARCH MILLS, NEWTON, NINETY SIX, ROCK HILL, RUCKERSVILLE, SHELBY, ST. STEPHENS, STONY POINT, TAYLORSVILLE, UNION, AND WARE SHOALS.
